generateNewField

public static void generateNewField(int w,
                                    int h,
                                    java.lang.String title)
Convenience method for opening a new ViewPort with a internal width / height

Parameters:
w - The (internal) width of the new field.
h - The (internal) height of the new field.
title - The title of the new window. (Usually just the file name or Untitled)
